description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物与儿童权益运动者，前时代力量党员。因其姪子王昊于2011年遭虐死，她此后长期关注并积极参与儿童权益维护行动，创立中华民国儿童权益促进协会，并加入民间组织“76行者”协助修复罹难者遗体，被媒体称为“国民姑姑”。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and children's rights activist, formerly a member of the New Power Party. After her nephew Wang Hao was abused to death in 2011, she has been a long-term advocate for children's rights, founded the Republic of China Children's Rights Promotion Association, and joined the civil organization '76 Monks' to help restore the bodies of accident victims. She is known by the media as the 'Nation's Aunt'.

description.zh-cn: 王薇君的姪子，在2011年遭灌毒致死，该案引起了社会的广泛关注。
description.en: Wang Wei-chun's nephew, who was killed by poisoning in 2011. His case drew widespread public attention.

description.zh-cn: 2011年发生的一起儿童虐待致死案件，受害者王昊为王薇君的姪子。此案引起社会广泛关注，并成为王薇君投身儿童权益保护运动的直接原因。
description.en: A child abuse case that occurred in 2011, where the victim, Wang Hao, was the nephew of Wang Wei-chun. The case attracted widespread public attention and was the direct cause for Wang Wei-chun to devote herself to the child rights protection movement.

description.zh-cn: 一个台湾的民间组织，义务协助修复事故罹难者的遗体。
description.en: A Taiwanese civil organization that voluntarily helps restore the bodies of accident victims.

nodes.id: 中华民国儿童权益促进协会

zh-cn: 中华民国儿童权益促进协会

description.zh-cn: 由王薇君创立的旨在维护儿童权益的台湾民间组织。
description.en: A Taiwanese non-governmental organization founded by Wang Wei-chun dedicated to protecting children's rights.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的一项旨在保障儿童及少年福利与权益的法律。
description.en: A Taiwanese law aimed at ensuring the welfare and rights of children and youths.

description.zh-cn: 台湾台北市的最高行政机关。
description.en: The highest administrative body of Taipei City, Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 台湾基隆市的最高行政机关。
description.en: The highest administrative body of Keelung City, Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 由台湾总统府召集，旨在凝聚社会共识、推动司法改革的全国性会议。
description.en: A national conference convened by the Office of the President of Taiwan to build social consensus and promote judicial reform.

en: Ministry of Health and Welfare (Republic of China)

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的中央行政机关，负责全民健康保险、社会福利、照顾服务等事务。
description.en: A central government agency of the Republic of China responsible for matters such as National Health Insurance, social welfare, and care services.
Wang Wei-chun is Wang Hao's aunt.

description.zh-cn: 姪子王昊遭虐死案是促使王薇君投身儿童权益保护运动的关键事件。
description.en: The case of her nephew Wang Hao being abused to death was the key event that prompted Wang Wei-chun to engage in the child rights protection movement.

description.zh-cn: 王昊在此案中遭灌毒致死。
description.en: Wang Hao was killed by poisoning in this case.

relationships.target: 中华民国儿童权益促进协会

description.zh-cn: 王薇君创立了中华民国儿童权益促进协会。
description.en: Wang Wei-chun founded the Republic of China Children's Rights Promotion Association.

position.en: Chairperson of the New Taipei City Chapter

description.zh-cn: 王薇君于2022年3月加入时代力量并担任新北党部主委，后于2023年10月23日完成退党程序。
description.en: Wang Wei-chun joined the New Power Party in March 2022 and served as the chairperson of its New Taipei City chapter, later completing the procedure to withdraw from the party on October 23, 2023.

description.zh-cn: 王薇君曾加入“76行者”遗体义务修复团队，并担任发言人。
description.en: Wang Wei-chun joined the '76 Monks' volunteer post-mortem restoration team and served as its spokesperson.

position.zh-cn: 第三届儿童及少年福利与权益委员会委员
position.en: Member of the 3rd Committee for the Welfare and Rights of Children and Youths

position.zh-cn: 第四届儿童及少年福利与权益推动小组委员
position.en: Member of the 4th Promotion Group for the Welfare and Rights of Children and Youths

description.zh-cn: 王薇君推动了《儿童及少年福利法》第54条之1的增订，以加强对高风险家庭儿童的保护。
description.en: Wang Wei-chun pushed for the addition of Article 54-1 to the 'Children and Youth Welfare Act' to enhance the protection of children in high-risk families.
